item.title: Hugo commands and solutions
item.author: lasak.ad@gmail.com (Adam Lasak)
item.description:
Failed build&deployment on GitHub pages:

git submodule update --force --recursive --init --remote

Stackoverflow thread solution https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42417294/why-does-git-fail-to-fetch-specific-valid-submodule-for-a-given-commit-and-how-t

Keep updated .github/workflows/hugo.yml https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/
item.content:encoded:
Failed build&deployment on GitHub pages:

git submodule update --force --recursive --init --remote

Stackoverflow thread solution https://stackoverflow.com/questions/42417294/why-does-git-fail-to-fetch-specific-valid-submodule-for-a-given-commit-and-how-t

Keep updated .github/workflows/hugo.yml https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/
